Photon.Pun.Simple.ISpawnController Interface Reference Photon.Pun.Simple.ISpawnController
Indicates component controls the spawning and despawning of an object.

Public Member Functions
bool AllowNetObjectReadyCallback (bool ready)
Detailed Description
Indicates component controls the spawning and despawning of an object.
SyncState uses this to check respawn/despawn conditions before applying state changes.
